function ERU_EP05_04()
    -- .序章-4【1月第1週】「見つかった証」
    SaveData.Title = "見つかった証"

    -- //BG：公園
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG003aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    MSG([[ The park I visited again after about two and a half years. When I was little, I often played here, was often bullied, and often protected. ]])

    MSG([[ By my older sister Marika and another sister. ]])

    MSG([[ Knowing there's no way any clues would remain, I searched the park thoroughly. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1380.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual clothes・serious
 "Finally... finally, a clue." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ There were no other leads to follow regarding Armeria-san. With a hopeful heart, I desperately continued searching all over the park. ]])

    MSG([[ Then, at the base of a large tree, there was a fresh mark, as if someone had dug there recently. ]])

    MSG([[ There, I remembered an important event related to that tree. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1381.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual clothes・surprised
 "That's right. We definitely... wished to be together even ten years from now, and buried a time capsule here back then." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //SE：土を掘る音
    PLAY_SE("SEb052.wav")

    MSG([[ Not wanting to waste time looking for tools, I desperately dug into the ground with my hands. Even if my nails cracked on stones, it didn’t matter. I kept digging desperately. ]])

    MSG([[ After digging for more than ten minutes. What came out from below was—a rusty cookie tin. ]])

    MSG([[ It seemed to have been sent to the school by a local game company, and it had a penguin drawn on it. ]])

    MSG([[ No doubt. This was something buried long ago together with my two sisters. ]])

    -- //SE：箱を開ける鈍い音（ガパッ）
    PLAY_SE("SEb053.wav")
    WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ When I opened it, it was full of junk the kind of things kids would like. ]])

    MSG([[ But among them, there were two items that stood out. ]])

    MSG([[ They were a smartphone from about two generations ago and a photo torn in half. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1382.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual clothes・surprised
 "This photo is—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I took off the locket pendant I always wear, opened its lid, and took out the photo inside. ]])

    MSG([[ This photo, which had always given me energy, was also torn in half, and the two pieces perfectly fit together. ]])

    MSG([[ And there, it revealed— ]])

    -- //CI：繋がった写真
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI159a")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Me smiling between my two sisters. ]])

    MSG([[ Looking at the other sister holding my hand, I laughed with tears. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual clothes・tearful smile
 "I finally found you... Sister Armeria." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The child in the photo was Armeria-san. ]])

    MSG([[ She was my other sister, born into the complicated circumstances of “Aruto Inoue.” ]])

    -- 　最終章「ボク姫様と乙女主義」

    -- 24	もうひとりのお姉ちゃん	アルメリアとの思い出を思い出した
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(24)

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_05")
end
